skill.name: proxychains
skill.description: Auto-detect network issues and force proxy usage with proxychains4. Use this skill when encountering connection timeouts, DNS failures, or blocked network access. Default proxy is http://127.0.0.1:9910
skill.summary: Auto-detect network issues and force proxy usage with proxychains4. Use this skill when encountering...
skill.author: 2025Emma

security_audit.summary: This skill is purely documentation-based with no code execution capabilities. It provides instructions and configuration templates for using proxychains4. The included setup script only creates configuration files in user home directory and performs read-only connectivity tests.

content.user_title: Automatically use proxychains4 for network issues
content.value_statement: Network connection failures waste time and disrupt workflow. This skill helps Claude automatically detect network errors and retry commands through proxychains4, ensuring reliable access to GitHub, PyPI, npm, and other services.
actual_capabilities: Detect connection timeout errors and auto-retry with proxychains4
Automatically use proxy for known blocked services like GitHub and PyPI
Generate setup scripts to configure proxychains4
Offer troubleshooting guidance for common proxy issues
Support git, pip, npm, curl, wget, and docker commands
limitations: Requires proxychains4 to be installed on the system
Requires a running proxy server at the configured address
Only supports dynamically linked programs, not static binaries
Only supports TCP connections, not UDP traffic

use_cases.title: Access blocked code repositories
use_cases.description: Automatically route git and pip commands through proxy when GitHub or PyPI is blocked

use_cases.title: Install Python packages reliably
use_cases.description: Ensure pip and conda commands work through proxy for accessing international package repositories

use_cases.title: Pull container images through proxy
use_cases.description: Configure docker pull commands to route through proxychains4 for reliable image downloads

prompt_templates.title: Install Python package
prompt_templates.prompt: Install the requests package using pip. If the connection fails, automatically use proxychains4 to retry.

prompt_templates.title: Clone repository
prompt_templates.prompt: Clone the tensorflow/tensorflow repository from GitHub. If it times out, use proxychains4 to route through the configured proxy.

prompt_templates.title: Build with npm
prompt_templates.prompt: Run npm install for this project. If npm cannot connect to the registry, automatically use proxychains4 for the command.

prompt_templates.title: Docker with proxy
prompt_templates.prompt: Pull the nginx:alpine docker image. If the connection fails, retry using proxychains4.

output_examples.input: Clone a GitHub repository and install Python dependencies
output: Detected connection timeout. Using proxychains4 to retry git clone...

best_practices: Configure proxychains4 with a local proxy server running at 127.0.0.1:9910
Install proxychains4 on your system before using this skill
Test your proxy connection independently before relying on auto-retry
anti_patterns: Assuming proxychains4 works without a running proxy server
Using static binaries that are incompatible with proxychains4
Forgetting to configure DNS proxy settings causing DNS leaks

faq.question: What systems support proxychains4?
faq.answer: Proxychains4 works on Linux, macOS, and WSL. Install via apt, yum, brew, or compile from source.

faq.question: What is the default proxy address?
faq.answer: The skill defaults to http://127.0.0.1:9910. Configure your proxy server to match this address.

faq.question: Can I use this with Docker?
faq.answer: Yes. Use proxychains4 docker pull image:tag to route docker commands through the proxy.

faq.question: Does this skill collect my data?
faq.answer: No. This skill only provides documentation. It does not read files, access credentials, or transmit data.

faq.question: What if proxychains4 is not installed?
faq.answer: The skill will guide you to install it. Ubuntu: sudo apt install proxychains4. macOS: brew install proxychains-ng.

faq.question: How is this different from environment variables?
faq.answer: Proxychains4 intercepts all TCP connections at the library level, working with programs that do not respect proxy environment variables.
